T02TD2046E:146b-1: rakta ya m'a ri mantra sam gra n'a ma /
T02TD2046E:146b-3: gshin rje gshed dmar bo'i sngags btu ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD2046E:146b-4: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2046E:146b-5: rab tu dben par rab gtsang bas //
T02TD2046E:146b-6: mchod pa dang bcas sngags btu'o //
T02TD2046E:146b-7: bden pa tshad med pha rol phyin //
T02TD2046E:146b-10: bden pa'i dang po ka nas bzung //
T02TD2046E:146b-11: rten 'brel mtha' mar yi ge mchog / a'a li k'a li'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2046E:146b-12: dang por rnam thar drug pa spyin //
T02TD2046E:146b-13: de nas rnam thar lnga pa'o //
T02TD2046E:146b-14: de nas rnam thar bdun pa la //
T02TD2046E:146b-15: phyogs kyi brgyad pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2046E:146b-16: pha rol phyin pa'i gnyis pa la //
T02TD2046E:146b-17: phyogs kyi brgyad pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2046E:146b-18: de nas phyogs kyi bzhi pa bya //
T02TD2046E:146b-19: 'phags lam gyi ni drug pa la //
T02TD2046E:146b-20: rten 'brel gyi ni dgu pa spyin //
T02TD2046E:146b-21: rnam thar gyi ni lnga pa la //
T02TD2046E:146b-22: rten 'brel gyi ni bdun pa spyin //
T02TD2046E:146b-23: rnam thar gyi ni drug pa'o //
T02TD2046E:146b-24: yang ni de nyid spyin par bya //
T02TD2046E:146b-25: rnam thar gyi ni lnga pa la //
T02TD2046E:146b-26: rten 'brel bdun pa spyin par bya //
T02TD2046E:146b-27: 'phags lam gyi ni drug pa la //
T02TD2046E:146b-28: rten 'brel dgu pas brgyan par bya //
T02TD2046E:146b-29: rnam thar gyi ni bdun pa la //
T02TD2046E:146b-31: 'phags lam gyi ni gsum pa dang //
T02TD2046E:146b-32: rnam thar gyi ni drug pa la //
T02TD2046E:146b-33: rten 'brel gyi ni dgu pas brgyan //
T02TD2046E:146b-34: de nas 'phags lam drug pa spyin //
T02TD2046E:146b-35: rnam thar drug pa de nas spyin //
T02TD2046E:146b-36: yang ni de nyid spyin bar bya //
T02TD2046E:147a-1: 'phags lam drug / rnam thar gyi ni drug pa la //
T02TD2046E:147a-3: 'phags lam gyi ni brgyad pa la //
T02TD2046E:147a-5: de nas rngam thar bdun pa spyin //
T02TD2046E:147a-6: yang ni de nyid drug pa spyin //
T02TD2046E:147a-7: de nas phyogs kyi drug pa la //
T02TD2046E:147a-8: rten 'brel gyi ni bdun pas brgyan //
T02TD2046E:147a-9: de nas rnam thar drug pa'o //
T02TD2046E:147a-10: yang ni de nyid spyin par bya //
T02TD2046E:147a-11: de nas phyogs kyi drug pa la //
T02TD2046E:147a-12: rten 'brel gyi ni bdun pas brgyan //
T02TD2046E:147a-13: ding sang gi mkhas pa phal mo che'i ring lugs grags che ba rnams dang bstun na 'phags lam gyi brgyad pa la phyogs kyi dgu pas brgyan dgos par snang ba mkhyen ldan rnams kyis dpyad par 'tshal lo /
T02TD2046E:147a-15: // rnam thar gyi ni drug pa spyin //
T02TD2046E:147a-16: tshad med pa ni bzhi pa la //
T02TD2046E:147a-17: pha rol phyin pa'i dang pos brgyan //
T02TD2046E:147a-18: 'phags lam gyi ni tha ma la //
T02TD2046E:147a-19: rten 'brel gsum pas brgyan pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2046E:147a-20: rnam thar gyi ni bdun pa la //
T02TD2046E:147a-21: phyogs kyi brgyad pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2046E:147a-22: de nas rnam thar lnga pa spyin //
T02TD2046E:147a-23: yang ni de yi drug pa spyin //
T02TD2046E:147a-24: yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis te //
T02TD2046E:147a-25: las kyi sngas te nang rim gnyis //
T02TD2046E:147a-26: rang rang las kyis kha bsgyur bas //
T02TD2046E:147a-27: las rnams thams cad bde blag 'di la yang phyogs kyi dgu pas brgyan zer dgos pa 'dra bas snga ma bzhin phyad do//
T02TD2046E:147a-29: rten 'brel gyi ni dgu pa la //
T02TD2046E:147a-30: spyi bor rnam thar lnga pas brgyan //
T02TD2046E:147a-31: de nas phyogs kyi lnga pa la//
T02TD2046E:147a-32: rnam thar bdun pas 'og nas brgyan //
T02TD2046E:147a-33: de nas phyogs kyi bcu pa spyin //
T02TD2046E:147a-34: de nas mnga' bdag bcu drug mtha' //
T02TD2046E:147a-35: de phyogs kyi gsum pa la //
T02TD2046E:147a-36: phar phyin lnga pas 'og nas brgyan //
T02TD2046E:147a-37: de la rnam thar bdun pa spyin //
T02TD2046E:147a-38: rten 'brel gsum pas spyi bor brgyan //
T02TD2046E:147a-39: de nas mnga' bdag bcu drug mtha' //
T02TD2046E:147a-40: de nas phyogs kyi dang po la //
T02TD2046E:147a-42: bden pa yi ni dang po la //
T02TD2046E:147a-43: rnam thar bdun pas 'og nas brgyan //
T02TD2046E:147a-44: de nas rten 'brel gsum pas brgyan //
T02TD2046E:147a-45: de nas 'phags lam bzhi pa la //
T02TD2046E:147a-46: phyogs kyi brgyad pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2046E:147a-47: de nas 'phags lam tha ma ni //
T02TD2046E:147a-48: da lta ngag 'don dang lag len grags che ba rnams ltar na phyogs kyi dgu pa'i rjes ma gtogs rten 'brel gsum ba mi byed pa'ang mkhas pas brtag go //
T02TD2046E:147a-49: lan gnyis su ni spyin par bya //
T02TD2046E:147a-50: rdo rje sems dpa'i sa bon ni //
T02TD2046E:147a-51: lan gnyis bar du spyin par bu //
T02TD2046E:147a-52: da nas rnam thar gnyis pa la //
T02TD2046E:147b-0: pha rol @147b phyin pa'i lnga pa sbyar //
T02TD2046E:147b-2: de nas phyogs kyi bzhi pa la //
T02TD2046E:147b-3: phyogs kyi dang po 'og tu brtags //
T02TD2046E:147b-4: de la phyogs kyi brgya dpas brgyan //
T02TD2046E:147b-5: de nas phyogs kyi lnga pa la //
T02TD2046E:147b-6: phyogs kyi brgyad pas brgyan par bya //
T02TD2046E:147b-7: gdug pa'i yi ge bcu bzhi ni //
T02TD2046E:147b-10: sngon du sngags btu dag par bya //
T02TD2046E:147b-11: gzhan du dbang po'i dgra bo bzhin //
T02TD2046E:147b-12: mchod pa chen po byas nas ni //
T02TD2046E:147b-13: slob ma la ni rjes gnang spyin //
T02TD2046E:147b-14: de ltar ma byas nus mthu med //
T02TD2046E:147b-15: de ltar byas na shin tu myur //
T02TD2046E:147b-16: 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sngags btu ba slob dpon dpal 'dzin zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2046E:147b-18: // / pandi ta d'a na sh'i la dang /
T02TD2046E:147b-19: bod kyi lo ts'a ba bsod nams seng ges bsgyur ba'o//
